structure.unit: ADMINISTRATION OF TRUSTS -- LEGAL INVESTMENTS -- UNIFORM PRINCIPAL AND INCOME ACT

law.catch_line: Power of court to permit deviation and to approve transactions involving conflict of interest.
law.text: If the duty of the trustee and his interest as trustee of another trust conflict in the exercise of a trust power, the power may be exercised only by court authorization upon petition of the trustee.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 108, effective July 15, 2014. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 48.
